title: engirundAlumE ezhil
sahitya:
engirundAlumE ezhil migu vaDivElan tangum paDai vIDenruNarvAi manamE


anupallavi

  mangala umai bAlan shankaran magizh maindan mAl marugan vElan vEl tAngum vIran


caraNam    karuvaraiyil irundu irudi varai namakkE urutuNaiyAvadu muruganin nAmamE
arumukhamE vinai aruttiDum dhiranE maru piravigaLai agaTriDum guhanE
